params.amount: uint256 Amount of tokens to be transferred
params.from: address Address from which tokens are transferred

params._registry: address Address of governor, who is allowed to adjust whitelist

devdoc.title: Opium.TokenSpender contract holds users ERC20 approvals and allows whitelisted contracts to use tokens

claimTokens(address,address,address,uint.notice: Using this function whitelisted contracts could call ERC20 transfers
